description: Try our easy to follow Apple Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sauce,Pescatarian,Low salt,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Apple Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2-3 tbs sugar, depending on the tartness of the apple

recipeInstructions.text: Put the apples in a pan, sprinkle over 1 tablespoon of water, then add the sugar. Cover and cook on a low heat for 10 minutes, or until the apples have begun to break down.
Stir with a wooden spoon until the sauce reaches your preferred consistency - either a smooth purée or more chunky. Taste and add more sugar, if required. Serve warm or cold with roast pork.
